scoops.description: Git sourcecontrol.
Fuzzy finder for your shell. It provides interactive, incremental search and supports various shell integrations.
PowerShell wrapper for fzf, enhancing file selection and navigation in the command line.
Non-portable version of OpenHashTab, a shell extension for file hashing and checksums.
Fast, secure, and efficient backup program with deduplication, encryption, and data integrity verification features.
Disk Usage/Free utility with colorful output and advanced features, helping you visualize disk space usage.
A command-line tool that provides a feature-rich alternative to curl with support for syntax highlighting and more.
The Silver Searcher (ag) is a fast code searching tool similar to Ack, with a focus on speed and usability.
A cross-platform, GPU-accelerated terminal emulator with a focus on simplicity and performance.
The official terminal application for Windows, providing multiple tabs, customization, and integration with PowerShell, Command Prompt, and Linux.
A modern and intuitive terminal-based text editor with syntax highlighting and numerous plugins for enhanced functionality.
Nerd Font with glyphs from the 3270 font family, enhancing terminal and code editor visibility.
Nerd Font variant of Microsoft's Cascadia Code font, providing additional icons and symbols.
Nerd Font variant of Microsoft's Cascadia Code font, providing additional icons and symbols.
Nerd Font variant of Microsoft's Cascadia Code font with mono-spaced characters.
Nerd Font variant of Microsoft's Cascadia Code font with proportional spacing.
Nerd Font based on Fira Code font, including programming ligatures.
Nerd Font based on Fira Code font with additional icons and symbols.
Nerd Font based on Fira Code font with mono-spaced characters.
Nerd Font based on Fira Code font with proportional spacing.
Nerd Font based on the Hack font, providing enhanced programming symbols and icons.
Visual Studio Code is a popular, free, and open-source code editor with support for various programming languages and extensions.
Vim is a highly configurable, efficient, and extensible text editor, known for its modal editing and scripting capabilities.
Neovim is a modern text editor that extends the capabilities of Vim, providing improved extensibility and performance.
7-Zip is a popular open-source file archiver with high compression ratio. It supports various archive formats, including its own 7z format.
FileZilla is a cross-platform FTP, FTPS, and SFTP client with a user-friendly interface and powerful features.
SumatraPDF is a lightweight and fast PDF reader with minimalistic design and support for various document formats.
PDFsam (PDF Split and Merge) is a tool for splitting, merging, and rearranging PDF documents with a simple and intuitive interface.
Simplenote is a note-taking application with a clean and easy-to-use interface, supporting synchronization across devices.
Obsidian is a powerful note-taking and knowledge management application with a focus on plain text markdown files and interlinked notes.
Telegram is a cloud-based instant messaging app with a focus on speed, security, and privacy. It supports group chats, voice calls, and more.
Discord is a communication platform for creating communities, supporting voice, video, and text chats.
Geany is a lightweight and fast IDE with basic features for various programming languages, suitable for smaller projects.
CopyQ is a clipboard manager with advanced features, allowing you to monitor, manipulate, and paste clipboard items.
MinGW-w64 is a development environment for Windows that provides a collection of tools for building native Windows applications with GCC.
Haskell is a functional programming language known for its strong type system and expressive syntax, enabling concise and robust code.
Cabal is a build tool and package manager for Haskell, simplifying the management and distribution of Haskell packages.
Rustup is the recommended toolchain manager for the Rust programming language, providing easy installation and updates.
Go (Golang) is a statically typed, compiled programming language known for its simplicity, efficiency, and strong support for concurrency.
OpenJDK is an open-source implementation of the Java Platform, providing the Java Development Kit (JDK) for Java development.
.NET SDK is a cross-platform framework for building modern, cloud-based, and mobile applications using the C# programming language.
Node Version Manager (NVM) for Windows is a tool that allows you to easily manage multiple Node.js versions on your system.
NASM (Netwide Assembler) is an assembler and disassembler for the x86 architecture, widely used for low-level programming.
FFmpeg is a powerful multimedia processing tool that can convert, record, and stream audio and video files in various formats.
LAME is an open-source audio encoder for compressing audio files into the MP3 format with high-quality and configurable settings.
Audacity is a free and open-source audio editing software with features for recording, editing, and mixing audio tracks.
Blender is a powerful open-source 3D content creation suite, offering modeling, animation, rendering, and more.
GNU Image Manipulation Program (GIMP) is a free and open-source raster graphics editor used for tasks such as photo retouching, image editing, and image composition.
IrfanView is a fast and compact image viewer and converter that supports a wide array of graphics file formats.
Flameshot is a screenshot tool with annotation features, allowing users to capture and annotate screenshots easily.
Shotcut is a free, open-source, cross-platform video editing software with a sleek and intuitive interface.
VLC media player is a highly portable multimedia player that supports various audio and video formats, as well as streaming protocols.
Cutter is an open-source reverse engineering platform with a focus on malware analysis and binary disassembly.
Burp Suite Community Edition is a leading web application security testing tool, designed for security professionals. Also available: nonportable/burp-suite-pro-np
Google Chrome is a popular web browser known for its speed, security features, and wide range of extensions.
GDrive is a command-line utility for interacting with Google Drive, allowing file uploads, downloads, and management from the terminal.
Doppler is a tool for securely managing and sharing environment variables across development, CI/CD, and production environments.
